message: I propose to take $600000 and give you $400000. This seems fair considering the devaluation affects me more.
My counter offer reflects the devaluation. I believe this is a more equitable split given the circumstances.
I understand the impact of devaluation. Let's split it as before, but considering the devaluation, this is effectively more in your favor.
This is my final offer. I believe it's fair considering the accumulated devaluation. Take it or leave it.
